title: Gibi
overview: Yilmaz and Ilkkan are two friends who are constantly bickering with each other. His biggest features are always being able to do something that will turn their ordinary lives upside down. They grow tiny events with incredible skill, bring things to a level that will lead to hair. They are the embodiment of the misfortunes, strange events and despair that we experience every day. Get ready for the adventure of Yilmaz and Ilkkan, consisting of 12 different stories.
